casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Eddie WHITE. No. 18P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Eddie J. White, Pro Se. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th day of January 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Stokes County:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in Conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
